name: ap16
overview:
ap16 deliver world-class solutions in the following areas:

  • Systems Integration - Providing both Microsoft BizTalk Server 2009 as well as custom integration skills, we have the knowledge and experience to deliver integrated systems from supply chain management through to financial systems integration. For more information about Systems Integration please visit http://www.ap16.com/What-We-Do/BizTalk-Systems-Integration.
  • Web Applications - Complex data driven applications, large-scale product catalogues and multi language content management systems are standard offerings
  • Intranets - Facilitating effective internal communication within a business to provide increased efficiency utilising Microsoft SharePoint 2007 as well as custom solutions
  • Bespoke Software Development - Bespoke software solutions and custom applications for all platforms. Desktop, Web and Mobile.
  • Development Support Services - Whether you have an in-house team of 1 or 100, ap16 provide a cost effective support framework to help you use your existing resources more efficiently.
